plant.contentHtml: âš ï¸ Disclaimer: PawSafePlants provides general educational information only. This content is not veterinary advice. If your cat has been exposed to any plant, contact a licensed veterinarian or the ASPCA Animal Poison Control Center immediately. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of this information. Use at your own risk.
